key_responsibilities: act as primary front office staff
requirements: demonstrate ability to quickly address and solve problems
exceptional organizational skills and attention to detail
be able to work quickly in a fast-paced environment

key_responsibilities: preparing letters of greetings, condolences and congratulations on behalf of the Member
recruiting, training, scheduling and assigning duties for interns
requirements: significant experience interacting with the public
resident of the District of Columbia or willing to move immediately to D.C.
minimum of three years of Hill experience
excellent written and oral communication skills
Texas ties are a plus though not necessary

key_responsibilities: assisting the staff by performing various tasks
requirements: excellent oral and written communication skills
car and Tennessee ties are required

key_responsibilities: developing and implementing the Member’s legislative priorities
requirements: excellent oral and written communication skills
the ability to work well under pressure
an extensive knowledge of the legislative process
the availability to work long hours
proven knowledge of legislative and political processes
previous capitol hill experience in a leadership position
